titleStmt.title: A loving salutation to all Friends every where, in this great day of tryal, to stand faithful unto God, over all sufferings whatsoever
titleStmt.author: Brend, William, d. 1676.

notesStmt.note: Dated in the last paragraph "... 11th of the 9th Month, 1662, ..." and signed at end: William Brend.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
